name: smbrowserrng
description: Port of wwwwwwzx's SMEncounterRNGTool and Quandra's PokemonSunMoonRNGTool for the web browser written with Love and TypeScript.

scripts.winTest: dir *.ts /b > ts-files.txt && tsc @ts-files.txt && nodemon beefy main.js
scripts.linTest: ls *.ts > ts-files.txt && tsc @ts-files.txt && nodemon beefy main.js
scripts.build: browserify main.js -o webbundle.js && uglifyjs webbundle.js -o webbundle.min.js

author: pokeCalcNTR Devs
